statements: SELECT * FROM backups
SELECT database_name, backup_date FROM backups
SELECT backup_location FROM backups WHERE database_name = 'example'
SELECT * FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC
SELECT database_name, backup_date FROM backups WHERE backup_location IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE database_name = 'customers' ORDER BY backup_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT database_name, COUNT(*) FROM backups GROUP BY database_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT backup_id, database_name, backup_location FROM backups WHERE backup_location IS NOT NULL AND backup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date ASC, database_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT database_name, MAX(backup_date) AS latest_backup FROM backups GROUP BY database_name ORDER BY latest_backup DESC;
SELECT * FROM backup_plan;
SELECT database_name, frequency FROM backup_plan ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT database_name, last_backup_timestamp FROM backup_plan WHERE frequency='Daily';
SELECT id, backup_timestamp, backup_size FROM backup_history ORDER BY backup_timestamp DESC;
SELECT database_name, backup_timestamp, backup_size FROM backup_history WHERE database_name='sales' AND backup_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM backup_plan
SELECT database_name, frequency FROM backup_plan WHERE id = 1
SELECT count(*) AS num_backups FROM backup_history
SELECT database_name, backup_size FROM backup_history ORDER BY backup_size DESC
SELECT database_name, backup_timestamp FROM backup_history WHERE backup_size > 1000
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT id, backup_date, database_name FROM backups WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE database_name LIKE 'Prod%';
SELECT database_name, backup_location FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT id, database_name, backup_location FROM backups WHERE backup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE id = 1;
SELECT database_name, backup_location FROM backups WHERE backup_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE database_name LIKE '%prod%';
SELECT id, database_name, backup_location FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*), MAX(id), MIN(backup_date) FROM backups WHERE database_name = 'customers';
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT database_name, backup_timestamp FROM backups ORDER BY backup_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM backup_schedule WHERE backup_frequency = 'daily';
SELECT backup_id, backup_status FROM backup_logs WHERE backup_status = 'failed' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT backup_location, retention_period FROM backup_settings WHERE retention_period > 30;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE id = 1;
SELECT database_name, backup_timestamp FROM backups WHERE backup_timestamp > NOW();
SELECT backups.id, backups.database_name, backup_logs.backup_id, backup_logs.backup_status FROM backups INNER JOIN backup_logs ON backups.id = backup_logs.backup_id;
SELECT backups.*, backup_schedule.backup_frequency FROM backups LEFT JOIN backup_schedule ON backups.id = backup_schedule.schedule_id;
SELECT database_name FROM backups WHERE database_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY database_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT id, database_name FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT backup_id, success FROM backup_logs WHERE success = true;
SELECT backup_id, backup_status FROM backup_history WHERE backup_status = 'failed';
SELECT * FROM backup_config WHERE retention_period > INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT * FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT database_name, COUNT(*) FROM backups GROUP BY database_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT backup_id, backup_status FROM backup_history WHERE backup_status = 'failed';
SELECT DISTINCT config_id, backup_frequency FROM backup_config WHERE retention_period > INTERVAL '30 days';

SELECT backups.database_name, backup_logs.success, backup_alerts.alert_message FROM backups JOIN backup_logs ON backups.id = backup_logs.backup_id JOIN backup_alerts ON backups.id = backup_alerts.backup_id WHERE backup_logs.success = false AND backup_alerts.alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY backups.database_name ASC;
